dashboard.title: Overview
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor sing-box service, PIA profiles and WireGuard status

profile.title: Profile Manager
profile.subtitle: Add, edit or delete VPN profiles, select which region to connect

ingress.title: Client Management
ingress.subtitle: Manage WireGuard clients connecting to the gateway
ingress.listenPortHint: Port is managed by system configuration
ingress.addClientDesc: Create a new WireGuard client configuration
ingress.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete client "{{name}}"?
ingress.serverSettingsDesc: Configure WireGuard ingress endpoint and port
ingress.serverAddressHint: Clients will connect to {{port}} on this address
ingress.noServerAddressWarning: Please set server address before generating client config
ingress.setupServerAddressHint: Clients need the server address to connect. Use Public IP for remote access, LAN IP for local network.
ingress.publicKeyHint: Paste client's existing public key here
ingress.autoGenerateKeyHint: Keys will be auto-generated, private key shown after creation
ingress.privateKeyHint: Save this private key! It will only be shown once.
ingress.privateKeyPlaceholder: Private key will be shown here
ingress.qrCodeHint: Scan with WireGuard app to import config
ingress.allowLanAccessHint: When enabled, local LAN traffic bypasses VPN (for RDP, etc.)
ingress.cannotDetectLan: Unable to detect LAN, please check server network configuration
ingress.subnetHint: Internal address range for WireGuard ingress clients. WireGuard interface restart required after change.
ingress.migratePeers: Auto-migrate {{count}} existing client(s) to new subnet
ingress.migratePeersHint: When enabled, all client IP addresses will be updated automatically
ingress.subnetConflictWarning: IP conflicts detected with egress endpoints
ingress.defaultOutboundHint: Traffic from this ingress will use this outbound, ignoring routing rules
ingress.outboundSwitchFailed: Failed to switch ingress default outbound
ingress.peerOutboundHint: Traffic from this client will use the specified outbound. Leave empty to use ingress or global default.
ingress.peerOutboundUpdatedReloadFailed: Client outbound updated, but config reload failed

egress.title: Egress Manager
egress.subtitle: Manage VPN egress lines (PIA, WireGuard, OpenVPN and WARP)
egress.confirmDeletePia: Are you sure you want to delete PIA line "{{name}}"?
egress.confirmDeletePiaLine: Are you sure you want to delete this PIA line?
egress.confirmDeleteCustom: Are you sure you want to delete egress "{{name}}"?
egress.descriptionHint: Leave empty to use line tag as description
egress.customDnsHint: Leave empty to use PIA DNS

rules.title: Route Rules
rules.subtitle: Configure traffic routing rules, decide which domains or IPs use which VPN line
rules.addRuleDescription: Create routing rules by domains, keywords, or IPs
rules.catalogSelectDescription: {{count}} lists selected, added as geosite rules
rules.allTrafficDefault: All traffic will use the default outbound
rules.defaultOutboundDesc: Traffic that doesn't match any rule will use this outbound
rules.defaultOutboundDescHot: Existing connections won't be interrupted when switching
rules.rulesSaved: Routing rules saved, sing-box config updated
rules.confirmDeleteRule: Are you sure you want to delete rule {{name}}?

ruleExplanationItems.domainSuffix: Domain Suffix: Matches domains ending with the specified suffix, e.g., netflix.com matches www.netflix.com
ruleExplanationItems.domainKeyword: Domain Keyword: Matches domains containing the specified keyword, e.g., youtube matches www.youtube.com
ruleExplanationItems.ipCidr: IP CIDR: Matches IP address ranges in CIDR format, e.g., 8.8.8.0/24
ruleExplanationItems.protocol: Protocol Type: Matches traffic protocol, e.g., BitTorrent (torrents), STUN (VoIP), SSH, etc.
ruleExplanationItems.port: Port: Matches destination port numbers or ranges, e.g., 80, 443 or 6881:6889
ruleExplanationItems.order: Rules are matched in order, the first matching rule takes effect
ruleExplanationItems.default: Traffic that doesn't match any rule uses the default outbound

pia.title: PIA Login
pia.subtitle: Enter Private Internet Access credentials to configure VPN egress lines
pia.addConnectionDescription: Create a new PIA VPN connection
pia.securityNoteDesc: Credentials are only used in the container and not written to disk.
pia.egressManagementDesc: After login, add and manage PIA lines in the Egress Lines page.

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.subtitle: Export configuration for migration or backup, import configuration to restore settings
backup.encryptionPasswordHint: Leave empty to not encrypt sensitive data
backup.encryptionNote: When password is set, private keys and credentials will be encrypted with AES-256
backup.encryptionNoteV2: This password protects the database encryption key in the backup. Remember it!
backup.exportInfoV2: Backup includes the complete encrypted database with all configuration (including PIA credentials)
backup.noPasswordWarning: Without a password, private keys and credentials will be stored in plaintext. Keep the backup file safe.
backup.replaceWarning: Import will replace all current configuration. This action cannot be undone!
backup.decryptionPasswordHint: If backup is encrypted, enter the password
backup.selectFileFirst: Please select a backup file first
backup.importSuccessRelogin: Backup imported successfully, please login again
backup.checksumNotVerified: Warning: Unable to verify data integrity
backup.v1CompatNote: Compatible with v1.0 format backup imports

backupItems.ingressDesc: WireGuard ingress interface settings and client list
backupItems.settingsDesc: Server public address and other settings
backupItems.databaseDesc: SQLCipher encrypted database containing all config, routing rules, and PIA credentials
backupItems.encryptionKeyDesc: Database encryption key (protected by backup password)
backupItems.checksumDesc: Used to verify backup data integrity

catalog.title: Rule Catalog
catalog.subtitle: Quickly create routing rules from preset rules
catalog.searchDomainLists: Search domain lists... (e.g., netflix, steam, bilibili)
catalog.searchCountries: Search countries... (e.g., cn, china, us, japan)

catalog.domainListPlaceholder:
One per line or comma-separated
e.g.:
example.com
test.org
catalog.addedDomainsNote: Added domains will be listed as a separate list under "{{name}}" category
catalog.enterAtLeastOneDomain: Please enter at least one domain
catalog.confirmDeleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this custom item?

customEgress.fillAllFieldsError: Please fill in all required fields
customEgress.fillAllRequired: Please fill in all required fields
customEgress.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this egress?

directEgress.title: Direct Egress
directEgress.subtitle: Direct connection egress bound to specific network interface or IP
directEgress.tagHint: Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens. Cannot be 'direct'
directEgress.bindHint: At least one of bind interface, IPv4 address, or IPv6 address must be specified. Interface and address can be used together.
directEgress.bindRequiredError: At least one of bind interface, IPv4 address, or IPv6 address must be specified
directEgress.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete direct egress '{{tag}}'?

directDefault.dnsHint: Multiple DNS servers separated by comma or space
directDefault.dnsNote: This DNS is used for all traffic through the default direct outbound. Config regeneration required after changes.
directDefault.dnsRequired: Please specify at least one DNS server

openvpnEgress.title: OpenVPN Egress
openvpnEgress.subtitle: OpenVPN tunnels with direct interface binding (bind_interface)
openvpnEgress.authRequiredHint: This configuration requires username and password authentication. Please enter your VPN credentials below.
openvpnEgress.authValidationError: Please enter username and password! This configuration requires authentication to connect.
openvpnEgress.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete OpenVPN egress '{{tag}}'?
openvpnEgress.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in server address and CA certificate

v2rayEgress.title: V2Ray Egress
v2rayEgress.subtitle: VMess, VLESS, and Trojan protocol egress
v2rayEgress.flowHint: XTLS flow control for VLESS (use with XTLS Reality)
v2rayEgress.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete V2Ray egress '{{tag}}'?
v2rayEgress.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in tag and server address
v2rayEgress.deprecatedProtocolTooltip: VMess/Trojan protocols are deprecated. Please migrate to VLESS.

v2rayIngress.scanQrCode: Scan QR code to add configuration
v2rayIngress.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete user "{{name}}"?
v2rayIngress.xtlsVisionDesc: XTLS Vision flow control for better performance
v2rayIngress.xtlsVisionTcpOnly: Only available with TCP transport (current transport not supported)
v2rayIngress.tlsCertHint: Leave empty to use auto-generated self-signed certificate
v2rayIngress.grpcAuthorityHint: Optional. The domain name shown in gRPC Authority header for camouflage
v2rayIngress.xhttpModeHint: auto: server decides, packet-up: low latency, stream-up: efficient upload, stream-one: bidirectional
v2rayIngress.quicNote: QUIC transport uses default settings. Make sure your server supports QUIC protocol.
v2rayIngress.fallbackHint: When handshake fails, forward to fallback server (camouflage as normal website)
v2rayIngress.usageStep1Desc: Click "Enable Now" button and configure inbound parameters in the popup panel
v2rayIngress.usageStep2Desc: Select protocol type and security options:
v2rayIngress.usageStep3Desc: Click "Add User" to create client accounts, UUID will be auto-generated
v2rayIngress.usageStep4Desc: Click share button on user card, import the link into V2Ray client
v2rayIngress.configOption1Desc: No certificate needed, strongest anti-detection, click "Generate Keys"
v2rayIngress.configOption2Desc: Requires valid TLS certificate, or leave empty for self-signed
v2rayIngress.configOption3Desc: High-performance flow control for high-bandwidth scenarios
v2rayIngress.configOption4Desc: Compatible with legacy clients, Trojan requires password
v2rayIngress.deprecationWarning: Warning: VMess/Trojan protocols are deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please migrate to VLESS protocol.

adblock.title: Ad Blocking
adblock.subtitle: Manage ad blocking rule sets, supporting EasyList, AdGuard and other formats

adblock.noRules: No ad blocking rules added yet
adblock.addRuleDescription: Add a new blocklist from a URL
adblock.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete rule "{{tag}}"?
adblock.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
adblock.applyTooltip: Download enabled rules and regenerate configuration
adblock.applySuccess: Ad blocking rules applied, configuration regenerated

descriptions.antiadblock-chinese: Remove anti-adblock prompts on Chinese websites
descriptions.antiadblock-english: Remove anti-adblock prompts on English websites

auth.loginSubtitle: Enter your admin password to continue
auth.setupSubtitle: Set up your gateway admin password
auth.setupHint: This password will be used to access the VPN Gateway console. Please choose a strong password and store it safely.
auth.passwordRequirementComplex: Minimum 8 characters, must include uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
auth.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
auth.passwordNeedsNumber: Password must contain at least one number

groups.subtitle: Load balancing and failover configuration
groups.loadbalanceDesc: Distribute traffic evenly across all members
groups.noGroupsHint: Click the button above to add your first group
groups.deleteGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete group '{{tag}}'? This cannot be undone.

warpEgress.title: WARP Egress
warpEgress.subtitle: Cloudflare WARP egress (WireGuard protocol)
warpEgress.licenseHint: Enter WARP+ License Key for faster speeds
warpEgress.wireguardInfo: Registration creates a new WARP device using WireGuard protocol
warpEgress.endpointV4Hint: Enter IPv4 address only (port 2408 is used automatically)
warpEgress.licenseInfo: Enter WARP+ License Key to upgrade to WARP+ for faster speeds and more features
warpEgress.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete WARP egress '{{tag}}'?
warpEgress.reregisterConfirm: Are you sure you want to re-register WARP device '{{tag}}'? This will delete the existing configuration and create a new device registration.

chains.title: Multi-hop Chains
chains.subtitle: Configure multi-node traffic paths
chains.createDescription: Create a multi-hop chain through peer nodes
chains.noChainsHint: Click the button above to add your first chain
chains.name: Chain Name
chains.hopsHint: Select nodes in order for traffic routing
chains.noNodesHint: Please add nodes in the Peer Nodes page first
chains.entryRulesHint: Traffic matching these rules will use this chain (JSON format)
chains.relayRulesHint: Routing rules for intermediate nodes (JSON format)

chains.dscpHint: For WireGuard tunnels, uses IP header DSCP field for marking
chains.xrayEmailHint: For Xray tunnels, uses protocol email field for marking
chains.exitEgressHint: Traffic exits from this egress on the terminal node
chains.loadEgressFailed: Failed to load terminal egress list

topology.title: Network Topology
topology.subtitle: Visual overview of network structure and connection status
topology.graphDescription: Interactive view of peers and egress connections
topology.noNodesHint: Add peer nodes in the Peer Nodes page to see them here

peers.title: Peer Nodes
peers.subtitle: Manage peer-to-peer connections with other vpn-router instances
peers.listDescription: Configured peer nodes and their connection status
peers.noNodesHint: Click the button above to add your first peer node
peers.name: Node Name
peers.endpointHint: Format: IP:port. Peer tunnel port range 36200-36299 (not 36100 client ingress port)
peers.pskTooShort: Pre-shared key must be at least 16 characters
peers.realityDestHint: REALITY destination server address and port (e.g., www.microsoft.com:443)
peers.realityServerNamesHint: Client SNI values, comma-separated (e.g., www.microsoft.com, www.apple.com)
peers.xhttpModeHint: auto=automatic, packet-up=packet upload, stream-up=stream upload, stream-one=single stream
peers.xhttpHostPlaceholder: Optional, uses endpoint if not specified
peers.autoReconnectHint: Automatically reconnect when connection is lost
peers.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete peer node '{{name}}'?
peers.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete peer node "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
peers.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

pairing.generateDescription: Generate a code to pair with another node. Share it securely.
pairing.importDescription: Enter a pairing code from another node to establish a connection.
pairing.localNodeDescription: Identifier for this node on the remote peer
pairing.bidirectionalDescription: Allow the other node to connect back to this node
pairing.bidirectionalNotice: This is a bidirectional connection. Share the response code with the peer.
pairing.responseCodeHint: Share this response code with the peer
